title: Madrid finally awards contract to build F1 circuit for 2026 Spanish GP
summary: Madrid finally has a consortium to build the new Formula 1 circuit that will host the 2026 Spanish GP

qa_pairs.question: Which city is set to host the 2026 Spanish Grand Prix?
In what year is the new Formula 1 circuit in Madrid expected to be completed for the Spanish GP?
What type of event will the new circuit in Madrid host?
